PxfThreadPoolTaskExecutor: Create as a bean

By creating PxfThreadPoolTaskExecutor as a bean, we guarantee that the
shutdown method will be closed when the application is shutting down,
because beans have a destroy method, and in the case of
PxfThreadPoolTaskExecutor the destroy method calls shutdown when the
application is shutting down.

timeline.message:
Change the hint to require set client_min_messages=DEBUG1

Ask users to set client_min_messages=LOG instead, because DEBUG1 prints
out too much information, and LOG seems like a good level where not too
much is printed, but we print the stack trace
